# NSCollectionView.ScrollDirection.horizontal

**Case**

The layout scrolls content horizontally.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontal
```

## Constants

- **NSCollectionView.ScrollDirection.vertical**: The layout scrolls content vertically.
